name: Memory Tapper
description:
Was that 4 taps or 5? Test your memory against the clock!

Memory Tapper is a one-button memory game. The goal is to improve your short term memory as you earn a high score! You need to associate a number to a colour, and then tap the screen that many times.

There are 8 levels, each more difficult than the last. Can you memorise all 11 colours? It's easier said than done...
